name: Truthseeker
description:
By use of the truthseeker, your objective is to locate the alien who has infested one of the pedestrians. But hurry - if the alien reaches all 3 pillars, you will lose. The alien has a tendency to jump from one host to another, leaving behind the husk of a once living being.

Truthseeker is a 8-days game project developed by a team of 15.

This is the first minigame to be developed by our team for the Danish Dadiu programme.

A second iteration of the game will follow.

How to play

Extract the .zip folder and run the file DADIU_2020_MGP01_team3.exe.

Use the keys: W, A, S, D to walk. E to toggle the truthseeker. Hold down shift to run. Left mouse-click on alien to kill it.
